author: 0xunclebill
content: would contributing to libp2p, specifically the rust implementation of libp2p, be considered "in-scope" within the context of EPF?

author: tmiychao
content: Consensus layer uses libp2p so it makes sense to contribute to it as a dependency but ideally the contribution would be more tightly related to CL clients
